short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a button to Dotlan to export Jump Bridge networks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is intended for subscribers of a Dotlan jump bridge network(s).

This extension adds a button to Dotlan jump bridge pages which when clicked will copy all jump bridges to your clipboard. You can then paste the jump bridges into third party tools, such as SMT.

https://evemaps.dotlan.net/bridges
https://github.com/Slazanger/SMT
